name: LUMI (RealssT)
description:
Project: LUMI (Beta)

Lumi, a little girl who is going traveling with her family. Unfortunately, the car accident happens with her and her family. The car was falling from the cliff. But how lucky she is, she woke up near the car in the forest. Found out that her family is missing. Left only footprint nearby. She must find her family and get out of the forest...safe.

Develop by Team: Lumi
